entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 07:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

Temperature: -3.5°C

Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing rain early this morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
